title: Why do some singers seem to be consistently either flat or sharp when performing live? - Quora

response.answer_text: This indicates a lack of training and a problem with intonation. This could be the result of faulty resonance, inadequate breath support, or a faulty sense of pitch. Nothing a little bit of ear and vocal training can’t improve. However - acoustics also has a lot to do with pitch perception, so of course voice lessons isn’t a catch all! Haha.
